channel.title: may on talentdmrripley

item.title: May Hot Things
item.description: 1. Grand entrance First, we welcomed our first grandchild, Lana Jane, into the family on May 18th. She’s a great baby so far and I really like holding her. Lana’s parents are doing a great job and it’s fun to watch them work together and love on their first child. There’s something about when your babies have babies that you finally feel semi-successful as a parent. Is that true for anyone else?
